conversation.text:
Based on your preferences for an action movie, I would highly recommend watching "Edge of Tomorrow" (2014) directed by Doug Liman.
The film stars Tom Cruise as John Wettack, a soldier fighting aliens who gets to relive the same day over and over again, the day restarting every time he dies. Lara Pulver plays Dr. Elizabeth Stone, a scientist who has developed a way for people like John Wettack to have their days repeated indefinitely without dying.
The film is known for its incredible action sequences, including a famous scene where Tom Cruise leaps from one building to another.
Overall, "Edge of Tomorrow" (2014) directed by Doug Liman is an incredibly thrilling and action-packed movie that you absolutely must watch if you have any love for action movies.
